message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get $60 and you get $40. It's better to settle now before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
I think we can both do better than that. Let's split it 65/35, giving me a bit more to compensate for the faster inflation rate.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm taking a hit from inflation too!  Let's settle this before we both lose out even more.  63/37 - take it or leave it!
